strapiPost.title: Sam Dean Shares His Experience As Executive Director Of The Amazeum
strapiPost.content:
Over 1.6m people have visited the Scott Family Amazeum in Bentonville since it opened in 2015. Executive Director, Sam Dean, joined the team at KUAF to share his story and what he sees in the museum's future.

  • All in: Ten years ago, Sam Dean was drawn to Northwest Arkansas by the exciting work happening to develop what has since become the Scott Family Amazeum. He shared his experience and why he sees Northwest Arkansas as a special place to continue investing.
  • Creativity abounds: In the coming years, the museum plans to increase its science programming, expand the facility to accommodate more design-rich experiences, and provide more programs for teens and adults.

Listen to the full KUAF interview HERE.
